Text:
This album was complete self-produced by Ott himself, and is his first solo release.  Please support this artist by purchasing his album as a digital FLAC download at:
http://ottsonic.bandcamp.com/
For more info, view Ott's website at:
http://www.ottsonic.net
Always repay good vibes with good karma.
op here, originally bought the album and i agree plz show support by following this artist :)

As Crumblenaut said... Support OTT! So he can continue to make such incredible tunes! the album is only 10$ USD from http://ottsonic.bandcamp.com/ and IMMEDIATE digital download in any format including FLAC or MP3 320kbps.  

Ive purchased all 3 Ott albums after I "previewed" them from Piratebay ;)

Awesome tunes by the way , OTT fans will not be disappointed.
I may sound like an echo, but it's of great importance that Ott get payed for his work. At least for me. Cause if he stops making music I don't know what to do!!

Awsome that he's done a new album.
Thx alot.
